import React from 'react' import './ProductDetails.css' import { useState } from 'react' const ProductDetail=()=>{ const[name,setName] = useState(''); const[im,setImage] = useState(''); const[description,setDescription] = useState(''); const[price,setPrice] = useState(0 ); const[qunatity,setQuantity] = useState(0); const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ console.log(e); } return( <>

Product Details

{setName(e.target.value)}} id="inputAddress" placeholder="Enter product name"/>
{setImage(e.target.value)}} id="formFile"/>
{setDescription(e.target.value)}} placeholder="describe"/>
{setPrice(e.target.value)}} className="form-control" />
{setQuantity(e.target.value)}} className="form-control" />
) } export default ProductDetail
